title: Dreams Reign Supreme
description: Dreams Reign Supreme is a collection of short stories and poetry by Vincent Lowry, author of the acclaimed breakout novel Constellation Chronicles. Fans will be delighted to find Windows on the World, Vincentâ€™s heartfelt poem about his experience in the North Tower of the World Trade Center before its collapse, and The Paranormal Lists, a fictional story about a man burdened with an incredible psychic gift.
author: Vincent Lowry
